title: India projects biggest power shortfall in 14 years in June
description: India faces severe power shortfall, deferring maintenance and restarting idle units post-hydro decline. Efforts to maximize generation ongoing to meet demand, with focus on renewables and existing plants. Grid-India projects peak night-time demand.
